sentences.sContent: Can you tell me something about the Acropolis in Athens?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you tell me something about the Acropolis in Athens?
sentences.sCn: 你能给我讲一些关于雅典卫城的事吗?

sentences.sContent: If you’re on a cruise through the Mediterranean, you might only have one day in Athens.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you’re on a cruise through the Mediterranean, you might only have one day in Athens.
sentences.sCn: 假如你在一个穿越地中海的乘船观光团上，你就大概只能在雅典呆一天。

sentences.sContent: The best thing for me is that I have equaled what I have done at Athens.
sentences.sContent_eng: The best thing for me is that I have equaled what I have done at Athens.
sentences.sCn: 对我来说，最好的事情是，我取得了在雅典曾经取得过的成绩。
